title: New growth spotted!
notes: Sunny has produced 3 new leaves this week. The growth rate has really picked up since moving it to the brighter spot.

title: Yellowing leaves noticed
notes: Found 2 yellowing leaves at the bottom of Jade Beauty. Might be overwatering. Will reduce watering frequency and monitor closely.

title: First basil harvest!
notes: Harvested enough basil for tonight's pasta sauce. The aroma is incredible - so much better than store-bought!

title: Repotting completed
notes: Successfully repotted Monstera Mike into a larger pot with fresh soil mix. Added some perlite for better drainage. He's looking much happier already!

title: Weekly progress photo
notes: Peaceful Lily is thriving in the bathroom. The humidity from showers seems to be perfect for it.
